title: Aaron
summary: According to the Abrahamic religions, Aaron[note 1] (/ˈærən/ or /ˈɛərən/; Hebrew: אַהֲרֹן‎ ’Ahărōn)[3] was a prophet, high priest, and the elder brother of Moses.[4][5][6][7][8][9] Knowledge of Aaron, along with his brother Moses, comes exclusively from religious texts, such as the Bible and Quran.
